entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
